caption: This is an R&B music piece from a sit-com soundtrack. Initially, there is a male voice narrating what is going on in the episode. Then the piece starts playing with a high pitched male vocal at the forefront. The melody is being played by the electric guitar and the bass guitar while the rhythmic background consists of an acoustic drum beat. The atmosphere is urban.
